page.title: 16;;; 2 Chilton Residents ;;;;
page.content: ;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;; Mr. Ken Blissett has lived in the village for 69 years. This is all his life except for 7 years spent in Didcot just after he was married.He has lived in his present house, which he built himself, for 21 years.He recalls the village pump being installed in 1925 but it was only used in drought when the village wells dried up. ;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;; Trevor Hebberd was everpresent in Oxford United's team during the season 1984/5, when they won promotion to the First Division for the first time. Trevor started his football career in the United States with the Washington Diplomats before moving on to Southampton. In 1982 he was transfered to Oxford. ;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;
